quote: The greatest value of a picture is when it forces us to notice what we never expected to see. – John Tukey
fact: In a test performed by Canadian scientists, using various different styles of music, it was determined that chickens lay the most eggs when pop music was played.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: A book just fell on my head. I only have my shelf to blame.
